title: Ticket #7436: Python scripts broken on macOS
description:
macOS includes python and python2.7 executables, but not python2. Thus, python scripts that invoke python2 on the shebang line fail. We will undo the rename from python to python2 made in 8.8.6, while keeping the patch file that renames to python3 for rhel8.

The patch file to rename to python3 should be replaced with some cmakery that does the change as part of the build/install process. But that's for another ticket.
